overview: Using a matte box, multiple exposures, and only three rolls of film, Three Cities Winter '19 shows brief but dense portraits of Tokyo, New York and Paris in the same time period approaching the year 2020. While filming the final section in Paris, the camera finally gave out after being rewound dozens of times, leaving the map incomplete. The project was postponed until the artist could return, but going over the footage in 2021 it became clear that they shared a period in time that couldn't be revisited.
title: Three Cities Winter '19
